channel.title: I need help on how to make stuff in moparscape 3.2 and more
channel.description: hello i need help really badly (juststart moparscape) but i need major help cauz i need to know how to make my own server like with monsters and i got hamachi i got a "thing" [b]kingpeter2[/b] like when i start it goes on 127.0.0.1 thing and like i no the monsters codes like i go to npc list and i c them then i type like ::pickup #### # and the npc is in my inventory but like sometimes it's something else. i might be confusing u but ima confused the same as u are if ur confused...lol. and like i no the tutorial thing but it isn't working out for me i need like something easier like a list of dawnlaods that might be good for a new server user like me thank if you can reply :(

item.title: I need help on how to make stuff in moparscape 3.2 and more
item.dc:creator: @kingpeter2 kingpeter2
item.description:
@kingpeter2 wrote:

hello i need help really badly (juststart moparscape) but i need major help cauz i need to know how to make my own server like with monsters and i got hamachi i got a “thing” kingpeter2 like when i start it goes on 127.0.0.1 thing and like i no the monsters codes like i go to npc list and i c them then i type like ::pickup #### #
and the npc is in my inventory but like sometimes it’s something else. i might be confusing u but ima confused the same as u are if ur confused…lol. and like i no the tutorial thing but it isn’t working out for me i need like something easier like a list of dawnlaods that might be good for a new server user like me thank if you can reply
